# <i class="bi bi-database"></i> Data

The datasets used in my tutorials and projects across different programming languages are available here.  
You can either **download them directly** (<i class="bi bi-file-earmark-arrow-down"></i>) for offline use, or access them through 
**interactive codes** written in language programming (Python, <i class="bi bi-code-slash"></i> ; R, <i class="bi bi-bar-chart-line"></i>). 
These codes employ packages to fetch data online, allowing you to reproduce results dynamically and explore updated datasets in real time.
